alert.note: Alert for Northern Big Horn; Northern Rosebud; Pryor, Northern Bighorn Mountains; Southern Big Horn; Southern Rosebud (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 19 at 9:15PM MST by NWS Billings
info.description: ...AN AREA OF SNOW TO AFFECT BIG HORN AND SOUTHERN ROSEBUD COUNTIES LATE THIS EVENING AND OVERNIGHT... An area of snow will impact central and southern Big Horn county and southern Rosebud county tonight. Snow will accumulate to an inch or two, mainly on grassy surfaces, with roads becoming snow covered and slick. Higher hills in the area (Lame Deer Divide) will have the best potential of picking up 2-3 inches of snow tonight. Travelers are urged to use caution. Locations impacted include... Hardin, Lodge Grass, Lame Deer, Busby, Crow Agency, Ashland, Birney, Wyola, Tongue River Reservoir, Birney Village, St. Xavier, Brandenberg, Kirby, Muddy Cluster, Rosebud Battlefield Park, Crow Indian Reservation and Northern Cheyenne Indian Reservation. Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time when traveling.

area.areaDesc: Northern Big Horn; Northern Rosebud; Pryor, Northern Bighorn Mountains; Southern Big Horn; Southern Rosebud
